a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Greenhouse gas emissions by gas, World, 1850 to 2021
Greenhouse gas emissions from all sources, including agriculture and land use change. They are measured in
tonnes of carbon dioxide-equivalents over a 100-year timescale.
Data source: Calculated by Our World in Data based on emissions data from Jones et al. (2023).
